member.name: T:Jcd.RichEnumerations.IRichEnumValueProvider`1
member.summary: A helper interface to enable building auto casting into the data type aware types. This helps minimize boilerplate code.
member.typeparam: The type of the value

member.name: P:Jcd.RichEnumerations.IRichEnumValueProvider`1.Value
member.summary: The underlying value

member.summary:

member.name: T:Jcd.RichEnumerations.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Provides classes to simplify creating and using DDD-style Rich Enumerations.

member.name: T:Jcd.RichEnumerations.RichEnumBase`2
member.summary: Provides access to all instances on the enumeration container by way of the .All property.
member.remarks: NOTE: This is intended as a supporting class. Consumers should prefer or instead.
member.typeparam: The type of the enumeration containing the enumerated items
The type of the enumerated data.

member.name: P:Jcd.RichEnumerations.RichEnumBase`2.All
member.summary: All enumerated elements. Populated in static constructor.

member.name: T:Jcd.RichEnumerations.RichEnumBase`3
member.summary: Provides access to all instances on the enumeration container by way of the .All property. And allows lookup of items by value. This is used in to provide conversion operators.
member.remarks: NOTE: This is intended as a supporting class. Consumers should prefer or instead.
member.typeparam: The type of the .Value property on the TEnumeratedItem instances. This is used in the conversion operators.
The type of the enumeration containing the enumerated items
The type of the enumerated data.

member.name: P:Jcd.RichEnumerations.RichEnumBase`3.ByValue
member.summary: A lookup of enumerated elements by their Value property. Useful for implementing conversion operators.

member.name: T:Jcd.RichEnumerations.RichEnum`1
member.summary: A with TValue set to int.
member.typeparam: The enumeration type. This will contain both the structure definition and the enumeration entries as public static readonly fields.

member.name: M:Jcd.RichEnumerations.RichEnum`1.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: A with TValue set to int.
member.typeparam: The enumeration type. This will contain both the structure definition and the enumeration entries as public static readonly fields.

member.name: T:Jcd.RichEnumerations.RichEnum`2
member.summary: A with .Value as a user provided type.
member.typeparam: The enumeration type. This will contain both the structure definition and the enumeration entries as public static readonly fields.
The data type for .Value

member.summary: A with .Value as a user provided type.
member.typeparam: The enumeration type. This will contain both the structure definition and the enumeration entries as public static readonly fields.

member.name: P:Jcd.RichEnumerations.RichEnum`2.Value
member.summary: The underlying value.

member.summary: Compares the Value of the current instance to the target instance for equality.

the right hand side of the comparison.

member.name: M:Jcd.RichEnumerations.RichEnum`2.op_Explicit(Jcd.RichEnumerations.RichEnum{`0,`1})~`0
member.summary: Explicit conversion to the underlying data type.
member.param: The instance.

member.name: M:Jcd.RichEnumerations.RichEnum`2.op_Explicit(`0)~Jcd.RichEnumerations.RichEnum{`0,`1}
member.summary: Explicit conversion from the underlying data type to an instance. This performs a lookup on the known values.
member.param: The value to convert.
member.returns: The instance of the , if it exists. Throws an exception, otherwise.
member.exception: If a value not present in the enum is provided.

member.name: T:Jcd.RichEnumerations.SortableRichEnumBase`2
member.summary: A base for sortable rich enumerations. This type provides a hook to sort the .All collection. .Sort should be called only once and only once in the application startup.
member.remarks: NOTE: This is intended as a supporting class. Consumers should prefer or instead.
member.typeparam: The type of the enumeration containing the enumerated items
The type of the enumerated data.

member.name: M:Jcd.RichEnumerations.SortableRichEnumBase`2.Sort(System.Comparison{`1})
member.summary: Sorts the .All collection. This should be called only once and only once in the application startup.
member.param: An optional custom comparer

member.name: T:Jcd.RichEnumerations.SortableRichEnumBase`3
member.summary: A base for sortable rich enumerations where the .Value property is present on the enumerated type. This type provides a hook to sort the .All collection. .Sort should be called only once and only once in the application startup.
member.remarks: NOTE: This is intended as a supporting class. Consumers should prefer or instead.
member.typeparam: The type of the .Value property on the TEnumeratedItem instances. This is used in the conversion operators.
The type of the enumeration containing the enumerated items
The type of the enumerated data.

member.name: M:Jcd.RichEnumerations.SortableRichEnumBase`3.#ctor(`0)

member.typeparam: The type of the .Value property on the TEnumeratedItem instances. This is used in the conversion operators.

The type of the enumerated data.
